Beronova poruka kritičarima: Ljudi, tek je novembar, ima još mnogo da se igra...
“Jesmo izgubili, ali protivnik je bio zaista dobar. Frustrira nas što smo poraženi, pogotovo što imamo osećaj da smo imali utakmicu u rukama“, kaže najbolji strelac Zvezde
07 Nov 2019 by Nikola Stojković
Kada je Bili Beron povezao onih devet poena u trećem kvartalu i zapalio fitilj u Štark Areni, učinilo se da je Zvezda na pragu trijumfa koji bi mogao da napumpa mišiće i samopouzdanje podigne do neba. Sve je ipak palo u vodu na početku četvrte deonice kada su se razmahali Serhio Ljulj i Rudi Fernandez, a Zvezda ostala bez goriva za ozbiljniju borbu do kraja...
Beron je posle utakmice nekoliko puta ponovio da je Zvezda imala svoju šansu i da je nije iskoristila. Posle svega ostaje žal, ali ovo je postala situacija koja se crveno-belima sve češće dešava ove sezone...“Voleo bih da smo ih nadigrali u trećoj četvrtini, da smo imali malo veću razliku pred poslednji deo. Ali, oni su reagovali jako i bili su sigurni, posle čega mi nismo uspeli da se oporavimo i to je odlučilo utakmicu na kraju“, kaže Beron.


Šampionski duh Ljulja i Rudija pokosio Zvezdu


A, šta je Crvenoj zvezdi trebalo da dobije Real večeras, osim da zaustavi neuhvatljivog Valtera Tavaresa?“Tavares je izuzetno visok momak i jako ga je teško zaustaviti. Trebalo je da izvršimo veći pritisak, pritom smo promašili neke otvorene šuteve... Trebalo je da držim nogu na gasu u onoj trećoj četvrtini. Ali, Pablo Laso je dobar trener i znao je šta da radi kako bi Real odneo pobedu. Nama ostaje da pogledamo snimak i naučimo iz naših grešaka“.
I još...“Potrebno je da pogodimo još neke šuteve. Mislim da smo imali dobru šansu. Ne znam koji je rezultat bio na kraju treće četvrtine (52:49 prim. aut) ali znam da smo bili u dobrom naletu. Trebalo je da budem agresivniji. Kada ne igrate dovoljno konkretno protiv ovako dobrog tima, nateraće vas da skupo platite tu neodlučnost. To se nama desilo“.
Zvezda će u i u narednom periodu biti u Beogradu. U ponedeljak stiže Igokea, a onda u petak sledi utakmica protiv Asvela...“Nikada ne prestajete i to je lepota ove igre. Imali smo težak niz od sedam utakmica na početku, zato nam je svaka sledeća najteža. Morali smo da naučimo lekciju posle tog prvog meseca i sada nakupljeno iskustvo da primenimo na sledeću utakmicu – Igokeu. Jesmo izgubili, ali protivnik je bio zaista dobar. Frustrira nas što smo poraženi, pogotovo što imamo osećaj da smo imali utakmicu u rukama“, kaže Beron i dodaje:“Ništa nije izgubljeno, još je rana faza sezone i imamo mogućnost da se vratimo“.
Da li to znači da Crvena zvezda i dalje traži svoj identitet?“Dobar smo tim, imamo identitet, protivnike držimo na malom broju poena. Oni su postigli 75 poena, mada ne znam koji im je prosek ove sezone (78,0 prim. aut), a pritom su bili u ozbiljnoj seriji u poslednjoj četvrtini. U prvom poluvremenu su pogodili samo 33, na kraju prve četvrtine 12 poena što je dobro. Mi smo defanzivan tim, neke utakmice će biti ovakve – ružne. Tako ćemo dobijati ponekad“.
Crvena zvezda posle sedam utakmica u Evroligi ima samo dve pobede, a u delu javnosti vlada mišljenje da je ekipa već izgubila svoje šanse da se bori za četvrtfinale i da je situacija loša... Beron kao iz topa uzvraća:“Ne mogu da kažem da je situacija loša. Pa, tek je novembar. Sezona traje do aprila. Imamo 2-5. Pogledajte svih sedam utakmica i protivnike protiv kojih smo igrali, sve su to velikani. To su sve timovi koji se bore za plej-of. Mi samo moramo da naučimo lekcije iz svih ovih utakmica i pobede će doći“.
Foto: Star Sport

Beron's message to critics: People, it's only November, there's a lot more to play ...
"We lost, but the opponent was really good. It frustrates us to be defeated, especially because we feel like we had a game in our hands, "says the Star's top scorer
07 Nov 2019 by Nikola Stojkovic
When Billy Beron connected those nine points in the third quarter and set fire to the wick at Stark Arena, it seemed that the Star was on the threshold of a triumph that could pump muscle and confidence up to the sky. However, everything fell into the water at the beginning of the fourth section when Serhio Ljul and Rudi Fernandez swung, and Zvezda ran out of fuel for a more serious fight until the end ...
After the game, Beron repeated several times that the Star had its chance and did not use it. After all it remains regrettable, but this has become a situation that is happening more and more to the red and whites this season ... “I wish we had outplayed them in the third quarter, that we had a slightly bigger difference than the last part. But they reacted strongly and were confident, after which we failed to recover and that decided the game in the end, "says Beron.


The championship spirit of Ljulj and Rudy knocked down the Star


And what did the Red Star need to get Real tonight except stop the elusive Walter Tavares? ”Tavares is an extremely tall guy and very difficult to stop. We should have put more pressure, missing some open shots ... I should have kept my foot on the throttle in that third quarter. But Pablo Laso is a good coach and he knew what to do to give Real a win. It is up to us to look at the recording and learn from our mistakes. "
And more ... ”We need to hit some more shots. I think we had a good chance. I do not know what the result was at the end of the third quarter (52:49 note aut) but I know we were in a good rush. I should have been more aggressive. When you do not play specifically enough against such a good team, it will make you pay dearly for that indecision. That's what happened to us. "
The star will be in Belgrade in the coming period as well. Igokea arrives on Monday, and then Friday's game against Aswell ... "You never stop and that's the beauty of this game. We had a tough streak of seven games at the start, which is why each one is the hardest for us. We had to learn a lesson after that first month and apply the experience now to the next game - Igokea. We lost, but the opponent was really good. It frustrates us to be defeated, especially because we feel like we had a game in our hands, "says Beron, adding:" Nothing is lost, it's still the early phase of the season and we have the opportunity to come back. "
Does this mean that Red Star is still searching for its identity? ”We are a good team, we have an identity, we keep our opponents on a small number of points. They scored 75 points, though I don't know what their average is this season (78.0 overs), and they were in a serious streak in the last quarter. They only hit 33 in the first half, ending the first quarter with 12 points, which is good. We are a defensive team, some games will be like this - ugly. That's how we get sometimes. "
After seven games in the Euroleague, the Red Star have only two wins, and in the public opinion there is a belief that the team has already lost its chances to fight for the quarterfinals and that the situation is bad ... the situation is bad. Well, it's only November. The season runs through April. We have 2-5. Look at all seven games and the opponents we played against, they are all greats. These are all playoff teams. We just have to learn lessons from all these games and the victories will come. "
Photo: Star Sport
